Darker Skin Lighter Skin

Here we can see all of the contestants from darkest skin colour to light. We can see X at the darkest end of the spectrum. Contestant Y is on the far right at the lightest. But what if we were to view this by year?Here we can see all of the contestants from darkest skin colour to light. But what if we were to view this by year?

We can see with each series that diversity is improving (albeit very slowly).

Scroll to the bottom and you can filter each contestant or view by either face or skin colour using the toggle on the right hand corner.
